title: there's 1 mastery that i feel like it should never have left..
body:
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/b2/Arcane_Blade_mastery_s4.png/revision/latest?cb=20131122000114

Arcane Blade.

it deals 5% of your AP as an on-hit magic damage on your AA.

it might sound meh to regular AD Champs, but for us AP players, this mean we can last hit a WHOLE LOT BETTER
especially with the mages AA animation, you really want that "right" boost.

if anything, i really want this mastery back, i loved it, and i felt like it had the proper impact throughout the game.






**Edit: Riot, The community has spoken, how will you answer? **

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NObtKmsF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-29T16:49:39.089+0000)
>
> Oppresser is great for tanks who take 12 points in the ferocity tree. Why not remove bounty hunter?

Because Bounty Hunter actually has some interesting gameplay associated with it.

Feels too unreliable to me and it just helps snowballing the game. 

Wouldn't removing it help to lower snowballing?

I like it on champs that if I do even remotely well I know I can scare a kill on a minimum of 3 champs (like Talon)  By the time that oppressors multiplier really matters it is very likely I would have scored at least 1 kill on the adc, mid, and jg/support.  So it is straight up better in that case.

However Oppressor I fell is better on champs like Shen.  I want the extra damage but it isnt likely I am securing the kills for bounty hunters multiplier.

They both fill different champs wants. So I feel they are both valuable to keep
Please no. I quite like Oppressor {{champion:127}}
That's nice and all but why is it that mages have such horrible auto-attack animations? They are required to cs after all.
Because it is supposed to be more difficult for them to cs early, since late they can clear the best.

Meanwhile AD champions can get Ravenous Hydra, or Runaan's Hurricane; tanks can get Sunfire Cape, Cinderhulk or Titanic Hydra; and bruisers just generally have easier access to CDR to spam their skills more.
Mages still clear the best. Victor or Vel'Koz or Xerath just clear like its nothing.

Instead of replacing bounty or oppressor, why not add Arcane Blade as a tier 2 mastery in the Ferocity tree?
In fact Ferocity and Resolve should have a 3rd choice in tier 2.

If last hitting is your only gripe about the removal of Arcane Blade, you should probably look at the Savagery mastery again. 

Early game you'll have maybe 50 AP for the first few minutes, where last-hitting is most difficult for AP champs. 5% of that AP is 2.5 extra on-hit. Savagery, on the other hand, was buffed from 2 - -> 5, which means the extra oomph for last-hitting is still here.

The only good reason for bringing back Arcane Blade is for giving AP champs who auto or make use of on-hits a lot some more damage.
AP assassins have the worst win rate in the game right now.
